oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Pupil assignment plan: proposed plan for the desegregation of Chattanooga public schools, 1960 November 21
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chattanooga (Tenn.). Board of Education
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Draft plan to assign students to specific schools based by which the Board of Education in Chattanooga, Tennessee would approve student applications to attend schools based on a number of factors including building capacity and student-to-teacher ratios.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Segregation in education -- Law and legislation; Segregation in education -- Tennessee -- Chattanooga
Chattanooga Public Schools (Chattanooga, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:source: Chattanooga Board of Education desegregation plans, 1960
Chattanooga Board of Education records and correspondence, 1953-1961
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:isPartOf: Raymond B. Witt Chattanooga Public Schools desegregation records
